verses.text: And they took their \w journey|strong="H5265"\w* from \w Elim|strong="H0362"\w*, and all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Sin|strong="H5512"\w*, which \add is\add* between \w Elim|strong="H0362"\w* and \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*, on the \w fifteenth|strong="H2568"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* after their departing \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

And the whole \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w murmured|strong="H3885"\w* against \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*:

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Would to \w God|strong="H4310"\w* we had \w died|strong="H4191"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, when we \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* by the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w pots|strong="H5518"\w*, \add and\add* when we did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* to the \w full|strong="H7648"\w*; for ye have brought us \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* into this \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, to \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* this whole \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* with \w hunger|strong="H7458"\w*.

¶ Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Behold, I will \w rain|strong="H4305"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* for you; and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* and \w gather|strong="H3950"\w* a certain \w rate|strong="H1697"\w* every \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, that I may \w prove|strong="H5254"\w* them, whether they will \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in my \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, or no.\f + \fr 16.4 \ft a certain…: Heb. the portion of a day in his day\f*

And it shall come to pass, that on the \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* they shall \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* \add that\add* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* they bring \w in|strong="H0935"\w*; and it shall be \w twice|strong="H4932"\w* as much as they \w gather|strong="H3950"\w* \w daily|strong="H3117"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, At \w even|strong="H6153"\w*, then ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath brought you \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*:

And in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, then ye shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; for that he \w heareth|strong="H8085"\w* your \w murmurings|strong="H8519"\w* against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: and what \add are\add* \w we|strong="H5168"\w*, that ye \w murmur|strong="H3885"\w* against us?

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add This shall be\add*, when the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* you in the \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, and in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* to the \w full|strong="H7646"\w*; for that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w heareth|strong="H8085"\w* your \w murmurings|strong="H8519"\w* which ye \w murmur|strong="H3885"\w* against him: and what \add are\add* \w we|strong="H5168"\w*? your \w murmurings|strong="H8519"\w* \add are\add* not against us, but against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w Say|strong="H0559"\w* unto all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, Come \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: for he hath \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* your \w murmurings|strong="H8519"\w*.

And it came to pass, as \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto the whole \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that they \w looked|strong="H6437"\w* toward the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, and, behold, the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* in the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

I have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w murmurings|strong="H8519"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto them, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, At \w even|strong="H0996"\w* ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, and in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* ye shall be \w filled|strong="H7646"\w* with \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*; and ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And it came to pass, that at \w even|strong="H6153"\w* the \w quails|strong="H7958"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*: and in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* the \w dew|strong="H2919"\w* \w lay|strong="H7902"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* the \w host|strong="H4264"\w*.

And when the \w dew|strong="H2919"\w* that \w lay|strong="H7902"\w* was gone \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, behold, upon the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \add there lay\add* a \w small|strong="H1851"\w* round \w thing|strong="H2636"\w*, \add as\add* \w small|strong="H1851"\w* as the hoar \w frost|strong="H3713"\w* on the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*.

And when the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*, they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* to \w another|strong="H0251"\w*, It \add is\add* \w manna|strong="H4478"\w*: for they \w wist|strong="H3045"\w* not what it \add was\add*. And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, This \add is\add* the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* you to \w eat|strong="H0402"\w*.\f + \fr 16.15 \ft It is…: or, What is this? or, It is a portion\f*

¶ This \add is\add* the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*, \w Gather|strong="H3950"\w* of it every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w according|strong="H6310"\w* to his \w eating|strong="H0400"\w*, an \w omer|strong="H6016"\w* for every \w man|strong="H1538"\w*, \add according to\add* the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of your \w persons|strong="H5315"\w*; \w take|strong="H3947"\w* ye every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* for \add them\add* which \add are\add* in his \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*.\f + \fr 16.16 \ft for every…: Heb. by the poll, or, head\f*\f + \fr 16.16 \ft persons: Heb. souls\f*
And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* so, and \w gathered|strong="H3950"\w*, some \w more|strong="H7235"\w*, some \w less|strong="H4591"\w*.

And when they did \w mete|strong="H4058"\w* \add it\add* with an \w omer|strong="H6016"\w*, he that gathered \w much|strong="H7235"\w* had nothing \w over|strong="H5736"\w*, and he that gathered \w little|strong="H4591"\w* had no \w lack|strong="H2637"\w*; they \w gathered|strong="H3950"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w according|strong="H6310"\w* to his \w eating|strong="H0400"\w*.
And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w leave|strong="H3498"\w* of it till the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.

Notwithstanding they \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* not unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*; but \w some|strong="H0582"\w* of them \w left|strong="H3498"\w* of it until the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and it \w bred|strong="H7311"\w* \w worms|strong="H8438"\w*, and \w stank|strong="H0887"\w*: and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* was \w wroth|strong="H7107"\w* with them.

And they \w gathered|strong="H3950"\w* it every \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w according|strong="H6310"\w* to his \w eating|strong="H0400"\w*: and when the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* waxed \w hot|strong="H2552"\w*, it \w melted|strong="H4549"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass, \add that\add* on the \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* they \w gathered|strong="H3950"\w* \w twice|strong="H4932"\w* as much \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w omers|strong="H6016"\w* for \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \add man:\add* and all the \w rulers|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, This \add is that\add* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, To \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* \add is\add* the \w rest|strong="H7677"\w* of the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: \w bake|strong="H0644"\w* \add that\add* which ye will \w bake|strong="H0644"\w* \add to day\add*, and \w seethe|strong="H1310"\w* that ye will \w seethe|strong="H1310"\w*; and that \w which|strong="H3605"\w* remaineth \w over|strong="H5736"\w* lay \w up|strong="H3240"\w* for you to be \w kept|strong="H4931"\w* until the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.

And they laid it \w up|strong="H3240"\w* till the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, as \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w bade|strong="H6680"\w*: and it did not \w stink|strong="H0887"\w*, neither was there any \w worm|strong="H7415"\w* therein.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Eat|strong="H0398"\w* that to \w day|strong="H3117"\w*; for to \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add is\add* a \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: to \w day|strong="H3117"\w* ye shall not \w find|strong="H4672"\w* it in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.

\w Six|strong="H8337"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* ye shall \w gather|strong="H3950"\w* it; but on the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add which is\add* the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*, in it there shall be none.

¶ And it came to pass, \add that\add* there went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \add some\add* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* on the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* for to \w gather|strong="H3950"\w*, and they \w found|strong="H4672"\w* none.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, How long \w refuse|strong="H3985"\w* ye to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* and my \w laws|strong="H8451"\w*?

\w See|strong="H7200"\w*, for that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* you the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*, therefore he \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* you on the \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* of two \w days|strong="H3117"\w*; \w abide|strong="H3427"\w* ye every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* in his place, let no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of his \w place|strong="H4725"\w* on the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.
So the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w rested|strong="H7673"\w* on the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

And the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* thereof \w Manna|strong="H4478"\w*: and it \add was\add* like \w coriander|strong="H1407"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, \w white|strong="H3836"\w*; and the \w taste|strong="H2940"\w* of it \add was\add* like \w wafers|strong="H6838"\w* \add made\add* with \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, This \add is\add* the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commandeth|strong="H6680"\w*, \w Fill|strong="H4393"\w* an \w omer|strong="H6016"\w* of it to be \w kept|strong="H4931"\w* for your \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*; that they may \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* wherewith I have \w fed|strong="H0398"\w* you in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, when I brought you \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* from the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w pot|strong="H6803"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* an \w omer|strong="H6016"\w* \w full|strong="H4393"\w* of \w manna|strong="H4478"\w* therein, and lay it \w up|strong="H3240"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to be \w kept|strong="H4931"\w* for your \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.

As the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, so \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* laid it \w up|strong="H3240"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w Testimony|strong="H5715"\w*, to be \w kept|strong="H4931"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w manna|strong="H4478"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, until they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w*; they did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w manna|strong="H4478"\w*, until they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w borders|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*.
Now an \w omer|strong="H6016"\w* \add is\add* the \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* \add part\add* of an \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w*.
